backend/main.mo: Defines authorization mixin, ecommerce types, and in-memory state for users, products, categories, carts, orders, coupons, and site settings with initial health check and profile APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature verification evidence linking admin access behavior to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering routing, hooks, components, and feature integrations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with base styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app and setting the page title and favicon.
frontend/README.md: Documentation for setting up, running, and verifying the frontend with details on admin access, authentication, and Stripe setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all customer and admin routes using TanStack Router with theme, i18n, and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Modal dialog to add or edit categories with validation, backend mutation calls, and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Form dialog for creating or editing products, including validation, category loading, and backend save with retry support.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin interface to configure Stripe by submitting secret keys and allowed countries with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Simple looping image carousel rendering static home page banners.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Displays a grid of category cards fetched from the backend with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout including header, footer, document title setup, and identity loading gate.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright text and a referral link with branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, search, auth controls, cart count, theme and language options, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Provides reusable skeleton loader components for product cards, grids, categories, and order rows using shadcn/ui primitives.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Product card showing image, price, stock status, and an add-to-cart action with authentication check.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Image component that falls back to a placeholder on missing or failed product image loads.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines reusable React Query cache keys for products, categories, user data, orders, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Provides admin-side queries and mutations for products and categories using the admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Checks backend health via admin actor and exposes status flags with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Handles retrieving and mutating cart and wishlist data for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Public product and category query hooks using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all available coupons from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Retrieves customer orders and individual order details with optional polling.
Loads referral user IDs for the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Queries and updates site settings, enforcing a fixed shop name and invalidating cache on change.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Manages Stripe configuration queries and admin-side updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin-scoped actor for privileged operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the browser document title with a provided value or default.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to get and set site theme and expose dark-mode status.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Provides translation context and English/Hindi dictionaries for UI strings and exposes a hook for lookup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides category management with listing, adding, editing, deleting, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Shows a simple coupon management page listing available coupons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays basic admin dashboard metrics including orders, revenue, and product counts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Defines the admin panel layout with sidebar navigation and backend health status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page for future order management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Supports product listing, searching, sorting, creating, editing, deleting, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page to load, preview, validate, and update site logo via data URL with error handling and toasts.
Placeholder admin users page showing a basic card and message that user management is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user’s cart, calculates subtotal, and provides navigation to checkout or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Implements product browsing with filters, sorting, category selection, and URL-synced search.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows address, payment method selection, order summary, and simulates placing an order.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage sections including banner, categories, and featured products with translations.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message for a completed order and links to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays a logged‑in user's orders with loading states, empty state, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a specific order including status, totals, and item list, with loading and missing‑order handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success message with buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product information, handles add-to-cart and wishlist actions, and displays loading or not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page stating address management features are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile layout with tabs (overview, addresses, settings) and auth check before rendering nested content.
User settings page allowing theme toggle and language selection.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist, handling login state, loading state, and empty wishlist scenarios.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Utility to detect backend unavailability errors (e.g., IC0508) and produce user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, priorities, architectural notes, and known issues, mainly focused on fixing admin panel access, backend failures, and restoring branding.
